Reviews.Title: It's ok, but could be better
Reviews.Author: Esther
Reviews.Content: The picture is pretty good. Audio is merely adequate even after adjusting the sound settings. The "swivel" base is a joke. The base is glass which is screwed from the underside of the base to a plastic stand and then onto the tv. The screws protrude just enough that it scratched the table top that I placed the tv on when I attempted to swivel the tv. I had to place a cloth under the base to prevent further damage and make it easier to move.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture quality
Reviews.Author: Ben Eastman
Reviews.Content: The picture is crisp.  I can't really comment on the sound since I have a separate sound system. I really like that it has a USB on the side, definitely makes it easier to plug something into.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Eric Burke
Reviews.Content: The picture is decent, good TV for the bedroom. The sound on this think SUCKS! even after messing with the setting and the equalizer I still think the sound is garbage this is my only complaint

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: cooldaddyo
Reviews.Content: Bought this for an RV and it's perfect. Sound is OK once you adjust the equalizer and the picture is just great.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Daniel Tobias
Reviews.Content: Viewing angle & Sound quality is poor. Must have volume on 25 to hear it. Good for a kitchen or guest room

Reviews.Title: small imperfection
Reviews.Author: Randy Beavers
Reviews.Content: It has a red dot in the center of the screen that is very annoying, but otherwise has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Volume
Reviews.Author: Satexas
Reviews.Content: Tv picture good but volume not good at all, had to go buy extra speaks. Not sure if I would buy tv again

Reviews.Title: Sound is flat.  Picture good.
Reviews.Author: J.Ace
Reviews.Content: Was excited to get this for $179 on Cyber Monday.  After setting it up was very disappointed in sound quality.  Tried adjusting it every which way but no use.  Sound is just flat and has no depth to it.  Picture however is good.  Never had bad luck with RCA before.

Reviews.Title: Not gamer friendly
Reviews.Author: ThinkingRebal
Reviews.Content: Got this tv for gaming on an xbox. It was a bad idea soun quality is at max a 4 out of 10 with 1 being static and screams and 10 being anglic sounds. There is a lot of motion blur even after atempting to fix it. Picture quality is pretty good I say a 7 out of 10 but the color scale is messed up. There is no real black only a dark gray. To play games you will need to constantly change the color and brightness of the tv.There is also a bright spot in the center of the tv which annoyed me. The auto set up is pretty good kinda slow but still easy for set up..If you must buy this Tv buy a sound system with it or else it will sound like a tin can.For me this is not a good tv for watching Tv and it is worst for trying to game with it. Don't get this one speed the extra dollar and get a better one.

Reviews.Title: Looks superb!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Television works perfectly. Picture quality is superb can't complain. Sound leaves something to be improved on but I have it hooked up to my home theater so nothing to complain about. One down fall of this is it only has 1 hdmi port but I got a 3 port adapter so problem remedied.

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: D3C "--d3c"
Reviews.Content: Screen quality is fine, but sound is "tinny."  Warning: we wanted to secure it to a platform so it wouldn't get knocked over, but we couldn't screw through the base plate -- it's glass, surprisingly.  Mission accomplished with wall mirror mounting brackets.

Reviews.Title: Broken after just a few days
Reviews.Author: Curt Weber "fixit maven"
Reviews.Content: When I first got this, my first disappointment was when I saw the box said it was one of those LED / LCD which is basically another way of saying it's a fake LED. In other words, it's not a full LED television. I don't understand the difference completely, but I reviewed the ad again, and nowhere did I see the word LCD. However, I was initially pleased after first hooking up as the picture seemed pretty good. Understand though that I'm one of those that can't hardly tell the difference between blue ray and DVD, so take that with a grain of salt. Then, the next thing I noticed is that the volume changes at the speed of snail which was really quite annoying. But, thought I could live with that. Then after just a few days, a vertical blue line suddenly appeared on the screen, and never went away. So, I promptly decided to return the piece of junk, and bought the Toshiba 24L4200U. I feel sorry for those that find all this out after the 30 days. This is the second time now I've bought an RCA television product, and both times have ended in disappointment. So, I'm done with RCA.

Reviews.Title: Did not last long
Reviews.Author: Sonia Anca
Reviews.Content: Bought in December not working by April buy the warranty if you want this item. Sound is not to great

Reviews.Title: Unwatchable
Reviews.Author: Jason B Miner
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if this was a defective unit, or if it's just a crummy TV.  the picture is so bad that it's unwatchable.  The darker colors on the screen all have a strange green tint to them.  No amount of picture adjustments would fix it.  Item is being returned.  This was a Christmas gift for my son, so the big day was pretty much spoiled.

Reviews.Title: "meh"
Reviews.Author: R. D. Myers "PreppyDude"
Reviews.Content: This tv  would be good for anyone who's never seen a decent LCD television. The picture quality is sub par and it lacks the ability to fine tune it via the settings. This TV's best feature is having three HDMI slots. that's a rarity at this size and price point.

Reviews.Title: Very nice small TV
Reviews.Author: Yvonne L. Siler
Reviews.Content: I purchased as a gift for someone in an assisted living home, she loves it, just the right size, price, and picture is very good.

Reviews.Title: Horrible sound quality
Reviews.Author: Charles Pernal, Jr.
Reviews.Content: I'm surprised that some reviews state that there is some sound improvement after adjusting the Sound section within the Menu. Didn't work for me. Whatever the adjustment--and I tried all options--the sound stayed the same. The audio quality reminds me of listening to someone talking to me by phone, while at  a distance from their phone receiver and standing in a hallway. Hard to bear.

Reviews.Title: love it and it still works great after a year.
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: We ordered this for our daughter last christmas 2012, the tv has a great screen on it that is very clear. We have now had it for a year and have not had any problems out of it. Picture is still just as nice as when we got it. Very good purchase

Reviews.Title: Nice TV set I like it!
Reviews.Author: Manny
Reviews.Content: I have been using it for a few months now and so far no problems whatsoever besides the fact that the lowest volume setting is a little to loud for me. The picture is nice and the colors bright and vivid.

Reviews.Title: Bad buy...
Reviews.Author: Alex L.
Reviews.Content: The TV does not have a good tuner, just tune all channels with an outdoor antenna. The menu is very limited in features, image quality is average. Not a good buy, better invest some more dlls and get something of better quality.

Reviews.Title: Good office TV
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Great set for the price. A 1080p and LED! With Very low power consumption. No regrets on this TV purchase.

Reviews.Title: Mom really likes it
Reviews.Author: LTPWJ
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Xmas gift.  Mom really likes it.Great color,  Easy to set up, Good sound.  Shewill be using it for years.

Reviews.Title: Just in time
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: as I preorder it when there is no shipment. It actually told me when and got it on time . And the TV is a good product

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amy Hanse
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a gift and it is really well liked by the recipient. Very good quality and description of the item was very accurate.

Reviews.Title: RCA Flat Screen Review!
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. Mason
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV while in Afghanistan and it was delivered very quickly and I like that it's small and affordable. Great for a first TV for college and military dorms and has headphone jacks which comes in handy when you have roommates.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: chris McArthur
Reviews.Content: Impressive tv. Led technology for a very cheap price. RCA knows what they are doing. One HDMI output  is the only negative but I got the splitter. Now I have three hdmi inputs. Over all a complete winner. Nice job RCA

Reviews.Title: Great TV but a few qualms
Reviews.Author: Sajid G. Mulla
Reviews.Content: I noticed that the stand on most TVs in this size and price range have flimsy do it yourself screws that you have to mount and a small joke of a stand.I tell you this is a big pet peeve for me I remember growing up and things were usually packed properly and wasn't meant to be used a couple of  years and being disposable.I use to look at RCA and say hey this company was a pioneer in TV and quality and should test the will of time. Sadly like other companies that is no longer the case.I feel if your competing in the marketplace RCA should pioneer in quality and make a quality product and a sturdy stand.Picture quality is decent for this price range but I can no longer stand the flimsy screws or stands. They should preassemble and prebuild these sets and ship them out so the customer does not get frustrated and make it bigger and better but then I figured the price will go up and then I would of looked elsewhere.It is because of the brand I bought this set and I'm not disappointed with the size and range of options.  I bought this primarily for a business so I am not personally using this but just giving my initial impressions.

Reviews.Title: A great product ...
Reviews.Author: Thomas Smith
Reviews.Content: After searching for a 24" television for two of my grand children I finally settled on this, and can tell you that both myself and my grand kids were not disappointed!! A great product for a great price! What more can I ask for?

ProductInfo.Features: 24 - Inch LED Full 1080p HDTV, 1 HDMI Connection, Resolution: 1920 x 1080, Tuner Mode: ATSC/NTSC, Contrast: 1000:1
ProductInfo.Name: RCA 24-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV - LED24B45RQ (Old Version)
